summary: Business analyst with 6.5 years of software industry experience and 4.5 years as business and system analyst; focused on web applications; seeking senior business and system analyst / product management roles.

experience.title: Senior Business Analyst Team Lead
experience.description: Responsibilities and Experience: requirement elicitation and elaboration; created new version of the online store www.mvideo.ru based on the microservices (as business analyst); all main pages of product selection process; BPMN; UML; built the analysis process from scratch; created the site knowledge base; REST API; led the analyst team, expanded it from 2 to 27 members; SQL; responsible for user-story mapping; reengineering and creating new business processes; use case; agile (Scrum, Kanban); gathering and elaborations of different requirements: business, functional, non-functional; requirements for BFF-level REST integrations; supporting dev and QA teams during the entire feature life cycle; estimating workloads and planning analyst tasks for product teams.

experience.title: Business analyst
experience.description: English - fluent; Russian - native; created and deployed to production the new algorithm for delivering patients results; created and deployed to production new payment process for cash registers and new process of fulfilling field orders day to day; was responsible for business requirements elicitation, functional and non-functional requirements elaborations; relational database design (using UML diagrams, SQL); creating the interface (using Axure RP).

experience.title: Junior software engineer
experience.description: Created the software, using Siebel eScript and JavaScript, SQL queries.

experience.title: Junior QA automation engineer
experience.description: Developed unit tests, based on the acceptance criteria; resolved bugs identified as a result of testing.

education.degree: Master's degree in Computer Software eCommerce
Bachelor's degree in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science
